_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map DE_ABBOTTABAD


Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: November 8 2014

Here is the Navigation Mesh for fine map for fast and ruthless fights [de_abbottabad](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/156129) by Fletch (released May 2011).
It's a totally hand-made and carefully optimized .nav-file (because in map author's original nav-file considerable errors were allowed).

With an initial auto-generated Navigation Mesh the Bots don't take every path (that is especially critical - one of the main pathways through the sewers was broken off). Also multiple corrections was made (missed ladder was builded, some areas are re-connects and re-combines, improved the movement through window and so more).

Well... bots use all possible ways now and sucessfully operate on all extent of the map. Not to disappear from them anywhere! :D

Also this Navigation Mesh is fully Place Painted.

NOTE: For possibility of comparison and in-game testing the original .nav-file by creator of map embedded in .bsp-file and available to downloading with the [same map](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/156129).

P.S. This map was pleasant to me very much and it to deserve higher rating... it's a pity that I couldn't vote for it as the rating period already expired :-(

Credits and Gratitudes:
   Fletch (for rather realistic and very fight-friendly reconstruction of the real location).

Additional Gratitudes:
   BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),
   Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes),
   CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),
   Valve Developer Community (for learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

Tribute to Zero Dark Thirty!
